Attacks.Name: Scratch
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Flamethrower
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character gains the Burn special condition.

Attacks.Name: Dragon Claw
Attacks.Effect: This attack has a piercing effect. If a critical and a wild are rolled, ignore the target's defense dice.

Superpowers.Name: Blaze Boost
Superpowers.Effect: For the next attack, if Charmeleon has 3 or fewer Stamina remaining, increase the strength of its next fire-type attack by 3.

Superpowers.Name: Scorching Presence
Superpowers.Effect: Enemies within Range 2 of Charmeleon at the end of its turn suffer 1 damage.

Attacks.Name: Fire Spin
Attacks.Effect: This attack targets all characters within Range 2 of the point of impact. If a wild is rolled, characters hit by this attack cannot advance during their next activation.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Charizard character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
